title: The Happy adventure
creator_credit: John Fletcher, Leon Clore, British Information Services and National Union of Teachers
brief_description: Education in a modern infants’ school showing typical activities and emphasising the teacher-pupil relationship. Film made at Gossop’s Green Country Infants School.
